name: Pixilate
summary: Turns all Normal-type moves into Fairy-type moves, with an additional 30% boost.
viability: Pixilate with Hyper Voice. Enough said. 90 Base Power * 1.5 STAB * 1.3 from Pixilate = 176 total power. That's about as powerful as a Fire Blast, but with 100% accuracy and can hit through Substitutes. That alone is a selling point as to what makes this ability so great..
